reviews.review_msg: She is the amazing professor I have ever had. She is so patient and nice in explaining every detail during her class. And she has quizzes, group assignments and the presentation. Very recommend!
Awesome professor. Explains concepts well and only tests you on things covered in class.

Melissa gives amazing lectures that help you understand complex concepts easily. Bonus that her lectures are engaging and easy to follow. Her exams are very fair if you attend class. Quizzes help lots with what to expect on exams. Would recommend.
great class, really nice prof and always willing to help. Any finance student I suggest taking this class

Really enjoyed attending Professor Gatev's lectures. Has some good insight and perspectives on the current climate in the global business world. Lectures aren't mandatory to succeed but definitely recommend attending. Great course to have a better idea on current events in the financial industry.

horrible. First day of class and the first thing he says is " I am not going to teach you anything, read the textbook twice before coming to class and discuss amongst your peers". Does not care about the students or their lives outside of this course. Avoid at all costs.

I like how it's discussion based and I learned a lot from talking about the news and random Finance facts. But for exams, he gives you a study guide, and then asked questions that are not even on the study guide. SO WHATS THE POINT? He is a good guy but i studied so hard following the guide and he ended up asking something else.........

Teaching styling isn't structured & hard to follow. He explains a lot of math that isn't needed in exams. MT is take home (strongly advise you to use the txtbook not lecture notes). 2nd half of class is group pre. Final based on preMT and group pre. results. Strongly advise u to follow txtbook instead of trying to understand his lectures.

Carlos is one of the best teachers I had at SFU. He is funny and is very entertaining and knowledgeable, although he does talk fast at times but if you ask him he will repeat it for you or slow down. He is very helpful if you need help he will help. Awesome teacher!

Carlos is honestly a great prof. I had him for two courses. He gives great explanations and knows the content well. He also is funny so the lectures stay interesting. Despite being in a class with 30+ people, I felt like he was super open and personal with us all. The class is not an easy A but it is a relaxed class.

extremely disappointing class, I was expecting to learn about Security analysis, wasnt the case. All he did was have us use excel, didnt explain anything about it and  expected us to finish it at home with no reference to how to complete the assignments. Seems like he made up the class as he went.
